name: Flugtap Pro
description:
Funny flights for your pleasure!
Build plane, equip and launch!

Discover add-ons and power-ups!
Get more bonuses and cool upgrades to fly further and became first in the Flugtap Pro world records table!
Tap birds to earn additional money and get chicken-style plane.

Game features:

Cartoon-style graphics
Game Center
Five airplane designs with ability to mix parts
Special plane for banished seagulls
Cool upgrades
